com.philips.platform.appinfra.abtestclient

Interface ABTestClientInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ABTestClientManager

    public interface ABTestClientInterface
    The ABTest client Interface

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  ABTestClientInterface.CACHESTATUSVALUES
      NO_TESTS_DEFINED: no list of tests is configured NO_CACHED_EXPERIENCES: tests are configured but no experience values are in cache EXPERIENCES_NOT_UPDATED: tests are configured, cached experience values are of previous app start EXPERIENCES_PARTIALLY_UPDATED: tests are configured, some experience values are updated from the server in this app start, others may still be from previous execution or not cached at all EXPERIENCES_UPDATED: tests are configured, all experience values have been downloaded from the server for this app start
      static interface  ABTestClientInterface.OnRefreshListener
      These tests will be refreshes if you update cache after app restart or update
      static class  ABTestClientInterface.UPDATETYPES
      Update cache after app restart or update

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ABTestClientInterface.CACHESTATUSVALUES getCacheStatus()
      Returns the status of the cached experiences for the configured list of tests.
      java.lang.String getTestValue(java.lang.String requestNameKey, java.lang.String defaultValue, ABTestClientInterface.UPDATETYPES updateType, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
      Provides value for a given test.
      void updateCache(ABTestClientInterface.OnRefreshListener listener)
      Download experience values from the server.

    • Method Detail

      • getCacheStatus

        ABTestClientInterface.CACHESTATUSVALUES getCacheStatus()
        Returns the status of the cached experiences for the configured list of tests. At initialization of the module, the status is either NO_TESTS_DEFINED, NO_CACHED_EXPERIENCES, or EXPERIENCES_NOT_UPDATED. An updateCache() may change the state to EXPERIENCES_PARTIALLY_UPDATED or EXPERIENCES_UPDATED.
        Returns:
        status of the experience cache.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • getTestValue

        java.lang.String getTestValue(java.lang.String requestNameKey,
                              java.lang.String defaultValue,
                              ABTestClientInterface.UPDATETYPES updateType,
                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Provides value for a given test. If no value is available in cache, the default value will be returned and stored in cache.
        Parameters:
        requestNameKey - name of the test for which the value is to be provided
        defaultValue - value to use if no cached value is available
        Returns:
        experience value for the requested test.
        Since:
        1.0.0

      • updateCache

        void updateCache(ABTestClientInterface.OnRefreshListener listener)
        Download experience values from the server. Call will have no effect if state equals NO_TESTS_DEFINED or EXPERIENCES_UPDATED.
        Parameters:
        listener - for OnRefresh
        Since:
        1.0.0
